title: Hiddenly op
body:
Which champ is the most hiddenly op champ in ur opinions? like in every lane.. For the champ to be hiddenly op it has to be NOT played in the lcs at the moment..

i think garen is getting there maybe?

Btw dont just pick someone with a high winrate.. thats not hidden either :P

replies.body:
{{champion:3}} 
I just want some one to play him just once, so i remember he still exists.
imo he seems pretty gud.. whats hus problem??
His mana costs are difficult to manage and he has melee auto attacks.  Both of these can be overcome with skill, but it does make him a little harder to get into.
when i played him i could never get a gud ult off.. even tho i think his ult is soooo op

{{champion:78}} 

I've been saying she's secret OP for almost a year now and I will keep saying it until she gets a rework.

Everyone says Poppy is bad and unviable, yet everyone feeds poppy.
EVERY. FEEDS. POPPY.

This is half of the reason I hate Poppy so much. The other half being that it's nearly impossible to gauge if you can actually do enough damage to kill her, especially with her being played so little.

Poppy passive is so broken Rito pls.

Yeah, I'll be going mid and I see my {{champion:92}} against a Poppy and I'm just like "Okay, Poppy's going to be 4-0 by 15 minutes..."
And she was.
i wanted to learn her for yoloq.. but shes getting rework so i didnt do it..
I'm pretty sure she's on the list but she's not going to be done for a few more months. If you wanna abuse her stupid kit, go for it.
can u farm with her vs a darius or other lane bullies?

You're pretty weak early, but your passive makes you surprisingly tanky at all phases. Start cloth+5pots against lane bullies, or flask+pots if they're AP, and you should be able to farm pretty decently as long as you don't overextend.
A good poppy is the counter to everything.

{{champion:112}} Will SLAP. YOUR. SHIT. UNLESS HE'S DISABLED.
Unless he's an idiot and rushes all 3 of his upgrades before boots. More morons do it than you think they would.
Viktor isn't really hidden op anymore. He's actually been disabled in LCS for a while now. That's the only reason he doesn't see play.

{{champion:37}} 

she is EVERYTHING....
and has a lil bit of my <3...
so i might be bias 

1st champ ftw

i might deny this if its even brought up again since i love her and dont want her touched any more :P 

utility.....

imo its why riot keeps her where she is, as squishy as she is, as slow as she is, and continues to nerf her... she is amazing.... they might take her completely out of rotation one day if they cant nerf her enough            =^D

her healz are sub par... ok?...but she healz...thats lane sustain... and multiple people at a time, at a great distance...and not for complete crap ya know compared to a support that doesnt...  and she also has a full team shield....

and did you know her movement buff give full team... let me say that again... full team movement buff about 15%-30% (early - late) easy with no investment ...

you want a hec/yi/jinx/rotating grp sona is always ur girl 

and add to that her signature poke... and a poke to be feared by adc's who thought they could build just damage, or supports who thought armor was enough..... she is the yin to the adc's yang



but again... and i hate to admit it... im a bit of a "fanboi" about her, so maybe a grain of salt is needed with my opinions.....
Ugh, I hate those fucking HEALS, they might as well remove Soraka from the game.
